这游戏人类车队和单排完全就是两个游戏，车队这种东西在非对称竞技游戏里就是bug，屠夫根本拿不到多少有用的信息。钢筋和咬根被砍只会让单排人的游戏环境更恶劣，对车队没有一点影响，为了游戏销量不对车队采取措施不就是逼着屠夫守尸？不考虑屠夫和单排人游戏体验的后果就是白天没人晚上没鬼，好好一个游戏让zzz给运营烂了

18年入坑，那时候用免费屠夫也可以很舒服，黑妹玩到了三转一直带的咬根配黑衣，人类技能完善又平衡。
22年回归，三个人挂了两次一个人挂了一次，结局是四个全跑了，我个人是一点也不想玩屠夫了，只砍不杀没乐趣。
我始终不知道为啥这个游戏允许人类玩家四黑，哪怕你对应的给屠夫加个老版工匠被动都可以啊。现在环境就是车队戏耍屠夫，屠夫挂机掉分匹配新手乱杀。

do you love hating the game you play? are you a survivor of the league of legends boom?  are you getting a little *too* close with your friends and need to cause a fight to make some distance?

well have i got the game for you! come play dead by daylight where we have exciting things like: staring contests with a sexy man who wants to kill you, teabagging, desperate attempts to find a hatch, sacrificing your friends to the dark god by refusing repeatedly to take borrowed time, and bunny girls! plural!

but anyway this is a fun game to play with friends and an even more fun game to play alone because you outskilled your friends and now every time you play with them the killer dominates because he's at your MMR and not theirs

I don't understand developers who introduce gameplay elements without counters. If you introduce a fun element to a game, the very next thing you need to do is to come up with a way for the other player to counter that. 

BVHR has never done this. I don't understand their decision making process. 

This game WAS fun for me for a few hundred hours, so maybe that's a great thing, honestly.

Queues at night time, which is usually when you want to play this (or any) game are sometimes 30 minutes, with no counter, which feels like an anti-pattern to me. When you finally land in a queue you will almost always be against people smurfing.

Good community, fun theme and idea for a game, ultimately bad game
Lots of death 8/10

Oyun gayet güzel ve zevkli fakat oyunun aptal bir kitlesi var. Zevk almak ve güzel bir maç geçirmek isterseniz kurban oynarken 4 kişi pre girmenizi öneririm. Bazı katiller tunellese bile 4 pre gayet güzel işler çıkarabilirsiniz. Son olarak epic games oyuncularını ele alacağım, herkesin bildiği üzeri epic games çoğu oyunu ücretsiz dağıtıyor ve bunun üzerine oyuna para harcayan,değer veren kişiler oyunu bedava alan ve hiçbirşey umrunda olmayan insanlarla aynı oyuna düşüyor. Tabiki bu olaya bütün epic games oyuncularını dahil edemem cidden çok iyi oynayan ve oyunu umursayanlar da var aralarında. Bu soruna çözüm olarak herkes kendi platformundaki oyuncularla eşleşse oyun daha iyi yerlere gelebilir ve oyundaki ''feeder'' olarak adlandırdığımız insanların yani insanların oyun zevkini bozan ve oyun bozanlık yapan insanların cezalarının yetersiz olduğunu da ele almak isterim. İyi günler, mutlu yaşamlar dilerim...Saygılarımla...
Gostei, só que ele veio com a mae do bazza gemendo super alto dentro do jogo entao poderia ter sido melhor. Não era o que eu estava esperando então 10/10 sensacional perfeito FERNARNDAAAAAAAAAA

This game saved my life.

I am 69 years old.

My ex-wife and I have a daughter together, and adopted our son together. They are now both 4 years old.

When we were going through our separation, I found myself lost and miserable. I was self destructive. I got so mad one day from everything spiraling out of my control that I punched some concrete in a moment of overwhelming emotion. That caused me to break my 5th metacarpal in my right hand... my working hand... my games hand.. the hand that I held and carried my children to bed with.. The hand I desperately needed to make sure I could continue to provide.

After learning of the severity of my self-inflicted damage, I was borderline suicidal. Keep in mind that just a few months before this, I was the happiest man with no history of depression or anxiety. I have never had fits of rage, or been one to break down and cry, but I was in a low spot that just really buried me from being able to see the light on the other side.

Having nothing better to do, I searched for a game I could play, ONE HANDED while I recovered. I somehow stumbled upon this game and read some of the reviews. I decided that it had to be worth a shot... I must admit, I didn't beat the game, or play nearly as long as some of you. In fact, I may have only played this game a day or two.. With that being said, after doing so, I had a new found joy and hope for life. I was able to put behind me the pain and suffering that had been cast over me. I was able to experience other peoples joy and happiness. I was able to see the fruits of my "labor". I relaxed for 5 ♥♥♥♥♥♥♥ minutes to this music long enough to realize that I was going to be okay.

After coming to that realization, I turned the game off, and I went back to work. It hurt my hand like hell but I was motivated. I stopped feeling so damn sorry for myself, and I became the father I needed to be in that moment, not the weak boy I was behaving as.

Today, I am close friend with my kids mother. We don't fight, or argue, or say hurtful things to each other. We are parents, and friends.

I now have 3 kids. My third child is, wait for it, ALSO 4 YEARS OLD. The woman I am with was going through a very similar situation at the time of my own separation, and we just stumbled in to each others life unexpectedly. We have been in a relationship for a year now, and are very happy together.

Moral of the story, you never know what life holds in store for you, and if I would have given up when all the odds were stacked against me, I wouldn't be where I am today. This silly little game helped me realize that.
